extension.name: VK video plugin
extension.author: Alexandr Sudakov
extension.description:
This plugin embeds VK videos into articles simply by copying and pasting part of the video code between the vkvideo tags: {vkvideo}iframe parameters{/vkvideo}. For example for video:
click on "share video" -> "get video code"
You'll find embed code:
<iframe src="http://vk.com/video_ext.php?oid=32194266&id=162925554&hash=7d8c2e0d5e05aeaa&hd=1" width="607" height="360" frameborder="0"></iframe>
Which you turn into text in the article:
{vkvideo}src="http://vk.com/video_ext.php?oid=32194266&id=162925554&hash=7d8c2e0d5e05aeaa&hd=1" width="607" height="360" frameborder="0"{/vkvideo}

You can find more information here: https://github.com/cyga/vk-video-joomla-plugin

Don't forget to enable plugin (Toolbar: Extension -> Plug-in Manager -> switching the button from red to green).
